milestones.name: A Dame Walks In
milestones.description: Meet the mysterious client who sets the story in motion.
milestones.condition: The player has spoken with Vivian Lake and learned about the stolen Jade Falcon.
milestones.hint: There's a woman in your office who seems to have a story to tell.

milestones.name: Picture This
milestones.description: Obtain the photograph of the Jade Falcon as your first clue.
milestones.condition: The player has obtained the photograph of the Jade Falcon from Vivian or found it.
milestones.hint: Ask Vivian about any evidence she might have.

milestones.name: The Collector's Knowledge
milestones.description: Learn about the Jade Falcon's history from Mr. Chen.
milestones.condition: The player has spoken with Mr. Chen at the Golden Dragon Antiques and learned about the Jade Falcon's origin and significance.
milestones.hint: The Chinatown antique dealer might know something about Chinese artifacts.

milestones.name: Club Connections
milestones.description: Discover that Vincent Malone is somehow connected to the theft.
milestones.condition: The player has found evidence or information linking Vincent Malone to the Jade Falcon theft or the smuggling operation.
milestones.hint: Vincent Malone seems to know about everything that happens in this city. Visit the Blue Moon.

milestones.name: Trail to the Docks
milestones.description: Discover that the Jade Falcon is being held at Warehouse 13.
milestones.condition: The player has learned that the Jade Falcon is at Warehouse 13 at the docks, either through investigation, interrogation, or finding evidence.
milestones.hint: Smuggled goods have to come through somewhere. The docks are always worth checking.

milestones.name: Breaking In
milestones.condition: The player has gained access to the interior of Warehouse 13, either by obtaining the key, picking the lock, finding another entrance, or dealing with Scarface Tony.
milestones.hint: There has to be a way in. Look for keys, alternative entrances, or ways to distract the guard.

milestones.name: The Jade Falcon
milestones.description: Find and recover the legendary artifact.
milestones.condition: The player has physically obtained the Jade Falcon artifact.
milestones.hint: The Falcon should be inside the warehouse. Find it and take it.

milestones.name: The Real Story
milestones.description: Discover the true mastermind behind the theft.
milestones.condition: The player has uncovered the truth about who orchestrated the theft and why - discovering Vivian's true role and her connection to the conspiracy.
milestones.hint: Something about this case doesn't add up. Who really benefits from all this?

milestones.name: Endgame
milestones.description: Confront the mastermind and bring the case to a close.
milestones.condition: The player has confronted the main antagonist with evidence and resolved the case, either through arrest, confrontation, or revelation.
milestones.hint: It's time to confront the truth and end this.
